Build-Depends: debhelper-compat (= 13), dh-sequence-python3, pybuild-plugin-pyproject, python3-all, python3-hatchling, python3-pycurl, python3-pytest, python3-pytest-httpbin <!nocheck>, python3-pytest-mock <!nocheck>, python3-requests <!nocheck>, python3-vcr, python3-werkzeug <!nocheck>
Description: pytest plugin that allows recording of network interactions A pytest plugin that records network interactions in your tests via VCR.py. . Features: . * Straightforward `pytest.mark.vcr`, that reflects `VCR.use_cassettes` API; * Combining multiple VCR cassettes; * Network access blocking; * The ``rewrite`` recording mode that rewrites cassettes from scratch.
